name: Superstart, a modern style
description:
Modernized the blocks with a cleaner look.

The blocks now stick out and distinguish them selfs without a border through the added shadow.
additional_info:
Version 1.1:
* Removed the logo in the top

Version 1:
* Header height 150px
* Removed borders from blocks
* Added slight shadow around blocks
* Changed margin and padding on blocks
